name: Some Crappy Car Game
description:
Basically right, this is a game where you press A and D. You try avoid the other cars and collect the coins. Volume slider doesn't quite work yet but hopefully by next update will. Save data doesn't exactly save either.

MINIMUM SPECS: 

Windows 10/(MAC UNTESTED).

CPU that can handle 3D.

GPU maybe required?

I think like 4GB ram...?

A couple megabytes free storage.
